Sequence.name: Iec61850.ChargeStatusENS
Sequence.documentation: The ChargeStatusENS class is an FSGIM class derived from the 61850 ENS class. The ChargeStatusENS class attributes are exactly the same as those in the ENS class except the status value attribute references the DRCS.ChaSt.ING enumeration class rather than the ENS class.

Enumerated.name: quality
Enumerated.documentation: Quality of the attribute(s) representing the value of the data.

Enumerated.name: stVal
Enumerated.documentation: Enumerated values for the status.

DateTime.name: timeOfLastChange
DateTime.documentation: Timestamp of the last change in one of the attribute(s) representing the value of the data or in the quality attribute.

Sequence.name: Iec61850.GeneratorOperationStatusENS
Sequence.documentation: The GeneratorOperationStatusENS class is an FSGIM class derived from the 61850 ENS class. The GeneratorOperationStatusENS class attributes are exactly the same as those in the ENS class except the status value attribute references another derived FSGIM enumeration named GeneratorOperationStatusEnumeration. The GeneratorOperationStatusEnumeration class is an explicitly defined enumeration in FSGIM. In 61850, this enumeration is represented by a single value.

Enumerated.name: quality
Enumerated.documentation: Quality of the attribute(s) representing the value of the data.

Enumerated.name: stVal
Enumerated.documentation: Enumerated values for the status.

DateTime.name: timeOfLastChange
DateTime.documentation: Timestamp of the last change in one of the attribute(s) representing the value of the data or in the quality attribute.

Sequence.name: Iec61850.ConnectionTypeENS
Sequence.documentation: Type of electrical connection between the generator and the facility’s electrical distribution system. This class is an FSGIM class derived from the 61850 ENS class. The ConnectTypeENS class attributes are exactly the same as those in the ENS class except the status value attribute references another derived FSGIM enumeration named ConnectionTypeEnumeration. The ConnectionTypeEnumeration class is an explicitly defined enumeration in FSGIM. In 61850, this enumeration is represented by a single value.

Enumerated.name: quality
Enumerated.documentation: Quality of the attribute(s) representing the value of the data.

Enumerated.name: stVal
Enumerated.documentation: Enumerated values for the status.

DateTime.name: timeOfLastChange
DateTime.documentation: Timestamp of the last change in one of the attribute(s) representing the value of the data or in the quality attribute.

Sequence.name: Iec61850.SequenceDirectionENS
Sequence.documentation: The SequenceDirectionENS class is an FSGIM class derived from the 61850 ENS class. The SequenceDirectionENS class attributes are exactly the same as those in the ENS class except the status value attribute references another derived FSGIM enumeration named SequenceDirectionEnumeration. The SequenceDirectionEnumeration class is an explicitly defined enumeration in FSGIM. In 61850, this enumeration is represented by a single value.

Enumerated.name: quality
Enumerated.documentation: Quality of the attribute(s) representing the value of the data.

Enumerated.name: stVal
Enumerated.documentation: Enumerated values for the status.

DateTime.name: timeOfLastChange
DateTime.documentation: Timestamp of the last change in one of the attribute(s) representing the value of the data or in the quality attribute.

Sequence.name: Iec61850.SCR
Sequence.documentation: The SCR class defines the common data class definition for a "Relative Time Schedule Setting". This class provides a means for defining a relative time array of setting values, such as schedules, where the time interval between points may be variable. It has an array of value elements that is characterized by a set of parameters including the number of elements in each array, an array of times between each value and an indication how to ramp between consecutive values, units, multiplier, and a description.

Enumerated.name: cur
Enumerated.documentation: Currency as per ISO 4217.

Enumerated.name: multiplier
Enumerated.documentation: Units multiplier of the attribute valUnits.

Integer.name: numPts
Integer.documentation: Number of points used to define a curve or a histogram. This contains the dimension of array attributes val, rmpTyp, and tmsOffset.

Enumerated.name: occPer
Enumerated.documentation: Repeat period (Hour, Day, Week, Month, Year).

Enumerated.name: rmpTyp
Enumerated.documentation: Array of ramp types defining how to interpret the transition from one value to the next. ARRAY 1..numPts OF the enumeration X.rmpTyp.X ( 1=Fixed, 2=Ramp, 3=Average)

Integer.name: tmsOffset
Integer.documentation: ARRAY 1..numPts OF Integer time offsets in seconds

Enumerated.name: valEq
Enumerated.documentation: Equation for val: 1 = SI units. 2 = Currency as per ISO 4217 per SI unit. 3 = SI unit per currency.

Enumerated.name: valUnits
Enumerated.documentation: SI Units.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.ScheduleOperatingModeKind
Enumerated.documentation: Ed. Note: The ScheduleOperatingModeKind is a newly defined enumeration in 61850. It has not as yet (Sep 2013) been approved by the committee. Hence, this enumeration was cloned from the 61850 working documents and is subject to modification.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.SequenceDirectionENS_Enum
Enumerated.documentation: Enumeration that defines the phase sequence connection of the generator.

Unsigned.name: ABC
Unsigned.documentation: Wiring sequence that creates positive phase angles in the clockwise direction.

Unsigned.name: CBA
Unsigned.documentation: Wiring sequence that creates positive phase angles in the counter-clockwise direction.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.ConnectionTypeEnumeration
Enumerated.documentation: Enumerated set of the type of electrical connection between the generator and the electrical distribution system.

Unsigned.name: ThreePhaseDelta
Unsigned.documentation: Generator connects each winding to one phase of a three phase electrical interconnection.

Unsigned.name: ThreePhaseWye
Unsigned.documentation: Generator connects each winding from a three phase wire to a common neutral point.

Unsigned.name: ThreePhaseWyeGrounded
Unsigned.documentation: Generator connects each winding from a three phase wire to a common ground.

Unsigned.name: ThreePhase_ThreeWire_InverterType
Unsigned.documentation: Three phase generator connected using three-wires with symmetrical voltages between phases.

Unsigned.name: ThreePhase_FourWire_InverterType
Unsigned.documentation: Three phase generator connected using four-wires with symmetrical voltages between phase and neutral.

Unsigned.name: Other
Unsigned.documentation: The connection is some other type of electrical connection type.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.GeneratorOperationStatusEnumeration
Enumerated.documentation: The GeneratorOperationStatusEnumeration class is an FSGIM enumeration defining the operation state of the generator.

Unsigned.name: Other
Unsigned.documentation: The generator is in some other state.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.SequenceDirectionEnumeration
Enumerated.documentation: The SequenceDirectionEnumeration class is an FSGIM enumeration defining the sequence direction for the generator.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.DRCS.ChaSt.ING
Enumerated.documentation: This enumeration indicates the state of charge of a storage unit.

Unsigned.name: fullyDischarged
Unsigned.documentation: The storage unit is fully discharged.

Unsigned.name: fullyCharged
Unsigned.documentation: The storage unit is fully charged.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.DRCT.DERtyp.ING
Enumerated.documentation: Distributed energy resource type.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.MMXN.range.CMV
Enumerated.documentation: Measurement minimum and maximum range thresholds.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.X.ctlModel.X
Enumerated.documentation: ENUMERATED (status-only | direct-with-normal-security | sbo-with-normal-security | directwith-enhanced-security | sbo-with-enhanced-security).

Unsigned.name: status-only
Unsigned.documentation: The object is not controllable, only the services that apply to a status object are supported. The attribute ctlVal does not exist.

Unsigned.name: direct-with-normal-security
Unsigned.documentation: Direct control with normal security according to IEC 61850-7-2.

Unsigned.name: sbo-with-normal-security
Unsigned.documentation: SBO control with normal security according to IEC 61850-7-2.

Unsigned.name: direct-with-enhanced-security
Unsigned.documentation: Direct control with enhanced security according to IEC 61850-7-2.

Unsigned.name: sbo-with-enhanced-security
Unsigned.documentation: SBO control with enhanced security according to IEC 61850-7-2.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.X.occPer.SCR
Enumerated.documentation: Repeat period.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.X.q.X
Enumerated.documentation: Validity component of the complex "quality" attribute with only the following values: good, Invalid, Questionable.

Unsigned.name: Good
Unsigned.documentation: The value shall be marked good if no abnormal condition of the acquisition function or the information source is detected.

Unsigned.name: Invalid
Unsigned.documentation: The value shall be marked invalid when an abnormal condition of the acquisition function or the information source (missing or non-operating updating devices) is detected.

Unsigned.name: Questionable
Unsigned.documentation: The value shall be marked questionable if a supervision function detects an abnormal behaviour, however the value could still be valid.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.X.rmpTyp.X
Enumerated.documentation: 1=Fixed, 2=Ramp, 3=Average.

Enumerated.name: Iec61850.X.valEq.X
Enumerated.documentation: 1 = SI units. 2 = Currency as per ISO 4217 per SI unit. 3 = SI unit per currency.

Unsigned.documentation: 2 = Currency as per ISO 4217 per SI unit.

Sequence.name: Iec61850.DERCostParameters
Sequence.documentation: Economic drivers of operating the DER unit – operating cost, carbon rate cost, ramp cost, … (61850 Logical Node = DCCT).

Sequence.name: CarbonRatesCost
Sequence.documentation: Incremental carbon emission curve costs.

Sequence.name: ContractualAncillary
Sequence.documentation: Ability to provide ancillary services. 0 = N/A / Unknown. 1 = Load following. 2 = Immediate reserve (i.e., spinning reserve). 3 = Operational reserve (i.e., nonspinning reserve). 4 = Base load. 5 = Black start. 99 = Other.

Sequence.name: ContractualExportWLimit
Sequence.documentation: Contractual limit on export energy.

Sequence.name: ContractualHighV
Sequence.documentation: Contractual voltage high limit.

Sequence.name: ContractualImportWLimit
Sequence.documentation: Contractual limit on import energy.

Sequence.name: ContractualLowV
Sequence.documentation: Contractual voltage low limit.

Sequence.name: ContractualPowerFactor
Sequence.documentation: Contractual power factor to be provided by DER.

Sequence.name: Currency
Sequence.documentation: ISO 4217 currency 3-character code.

Sequence.name: HeatRateCost
Sequence.documentation: Incremental heat rate piecewise linear curve costs.

Sequence.name: OperatingCost
Sequence.documentation: Marginal operational cost per hour.

Sequence.name: OperatingWhCost
Sequence.documentation: Marginal operational cost per kWh.

Sequence.name: PriceCode
Sequence.documentation: Price code for the pricing signal.

Sequence.name: RampCost
Sequence.documentation: Cost to ramp DER per kW per minute.

Sequence.name: StopCost

Sequence.name: Iec61850.DEROperationalModeControls
Sequence.documentation: Operating mode at the ECP. Control of the operational modes of the DER (e.g., constant watts, constant vars.) More than one mode can be set simultaneously for certain logical combinations (61850 Logical Node = DOPM).
